DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of collection of the inclusion/exclusion criteria represented in an unambiguous date format. (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date the eligibi
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the eligibility criteria assessment was performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record complete date when the eligibility assessment was performed using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: IEDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable IEDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete date is expected. The date of collection may be determined from the date of visit (VISDAT) and if so, a separate assessment date field is not required.
